project.name: Queue Engine : Mini Phase 1 Model
project.description: This module houses a "mini" phase 1 model containing only the information of interest to the queue engine and in a format that is convenient to work with (e.g., without any need to worry about bad or missing data or nulls, etc.) This data is extracted from the original Gemini Phase 1 model and from the persistence model. This allows the queue engine to work with either underlying model.
